name: Zasbi
slogan: Bespoke Management and Consultancy for property industry
description: Zasbi offer a range of bespoke Consultancy and Management services for residential buildings. We deliver the complete management package for all aspects of our client’s property development, providing the utmost in health, lifestyle and wellbeing. Amenities include: bars, lounges, business centres, screening rooms, treatment rooms, gyms, pools and hot and cold experience rooms.

jobs.title: Business Development Coordinator
jobs.description:
As a result of our continued growth, we are seeking a business relationship co-ordinator to join our team. This role is designed for those outstanding candidates who are driven to exceed expectations. 

You will be responsible for developing new businesses and relationships across multiple sectors including Zasbi Consultancy, and Zasbi Management contracts. You will be required to understand and uncover the client’s needs to ensure Zasbi offer the best solution. Ideally you will have experience selling a solution and demonstrate targeted achievements. We are looking for a self-driven and motivated professional who wants to work for a forward thinking, fast paced company. 

Your Role

•	Generate new business opportunities with prospects clients by targeting all sectors of the business. 
•	Build a strong pipeline of relevant opportunities to deliver against targets and ensure KPI’s are met. 
•	Build and maintain an in depth understanding of our product, by working closely with our management and your peers. 
•	Attend events and build relationships to create leads. 
•	Take ownership of the full sales cycle from gathering leads, demonstrating the product and closing deals.  


Requirements

•	Experience within a similar role
•	Knowledge of a high-end service industry is desirable
•	Proven track record of meeting sales targets in business development / new business environment
•	Excellent selling skills built on trust and reliability
•	Proven ability to identify and develop new business
•	Proven understanding of sales metrics and to use them to build and plan for success
•	Strong, repeatable and reliable sales methodology to plan and develop sales
•	Excellent negotiation skills to secure profitable contracts


What we offer you 

•	In-depth training with our product and service. 
•	On-going career development
•	Vibrant company cultural and awesome social events
•	Unlimited earning potential and additional incentives
•	Freedom to operate creatively without vertical boundaries.


About Zasbi 

Our combination of high standards, innovative thinking and passion will enable us to become a market leader in our industry. What’s more, our ambitious plan for growth will include plenty of support for you and your professional development. We like to reinvest in our services and team.

jobs.title: Social Media & Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
As a result of our continued growth, we are seeking a Social Media & Marketing Intern to join our team. This role is designed for those outstanding candidates who are driven to exceed expectations.

Our combination of high standards, innovative thinking and passion will enable us to become a market leader in our industry. We pride ourselves on our investment in our services and teams.

Zasbi offer a range of bespoke Consultancy and Management services for residential buildings. We deliver the complete management package for all aspects of our client’s property development, providing the utmost in health, lifestyle and wellbeing. Amenities include: bars, lounges, business centres, screening rooms, treatment rooms, gyms, pools and hot and cold experience rooms.


Social Media & Marketing Intern

Your role at Zasbi will be to work alongside the founder and business development co-ordinator to help firmly establish the business and its brand through social platforms and online marketing. If your seeking and internship with lots of diversity, from contacting influencers, writing content and monitoring social media accounts, then this is for you. This is a great role for somebody who want to experience in the inner working of a start-up. 



You should possess the following qualities:
•	Be very confident and competent with the aforementioned social media platforms
•	Have an excellent command of the English language
•	Have an informed interest of the luxury property and service industry 
•	Be extremely creative and imaginative, especially using images and text
•	Excellent organisation and time-management skills, with the ability to work alone and as part of a tight-knit team

Typical work activates

•	Creating and developing content
•	Growing our online following 
•	Researching potential clients and their needs 
•	Writing articles and posts 
•	Managing multiple social media platforms   
•	Planning and running a full content strategy 
•	SEO and SEM optimisation
•	Overseeing all online campaigns and evaluating their effectiveness 


This post is a freelance flexible working role and is a great role for a student, or someone who is looking to boost their passion alongside another job.
